New Cder

Five Life Jackets to Throw at the New Coder

How to work through these tutorials →

How should a new coder approach these tutorials?

I. Data Visualization →

Data visualization is quite fun. Perhaps when you think of data visualization, you think of ugly Microsoft Excel spreadsheets with half-a$$ed graphs.
Introduction → or Dive in →

II. APIs →

Video games have always been a pricy hobby. With the next generation of consoles just being announced (or about to be) it makes sense to look at how pricing has changed on that front over time.
Introduction → or Dive in →

III. Web Scrapping →

This tutorial will walk you through how to make a web scraper, save the data to a database, and schedule the scraper to run daily. We will also introduce you to some simple queries to use on the database so you can query the information you scraped at your leisure.
Introduction → or Dive in →

IV. Networks →

This is my intro to the Networks tutorial using Twisted.
Introduction → or Dive in →

V. GUI →

This is my intro to the Sudoku GUI tutorial.
Introduction → or Dive in →
